docs.title: Home
docs.text:
Welcome! This is my friend Doug.

He is a badass musician / music teacher / electrician / producer / cat whisperer.

He can play drums, guitar, bass guitar, vocals, and probably some other instruments I've forgotten to list.

He has many talents, if you are trying to learn music you probably want to try a lesson with him. Want Lessons? Email him at franklloydrock@gmail.com

Beginning in 2024 he is starting to teach kids in middle school and high school, in Silver City New Mexico.

He is also recording an album that you can find out more about here

docs.title: Oonabloem
docs.text:
This is Doug's first Solo record that is coming out in 2024. 2 songs are available on streaming.

The first Song is "The Wind".

The second Song is "Weight of the City".
